widget.name: Mass creation leads
widget.description:
Description:
The widget allows you to bulk create copies of current leads.
It is possible to specify the person responsible for these leads, tags, select the funnel and stage in which the leads will be created.

Instruction:
Open the Leads section.
Select the leads you want to copy.
Click on the "Create Leads" button in the "More"(...) section.
In the window that appears, select the responsible manager, funnel and stage, add tags, and also specify a prefix for the name of new leads.
